textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   cheerios from the Avalon Peninsula, Newfoundland Cogito ergo zZOooOMm We'll just have to be patient ... I'm hoping Olympus made this new OMD even lighter than the E-M5, and a well-built plastic body is not an oxymoron. However, if they sacrificed so much weight, such that they eliminated the E-M1's EVF, I'll be very disappointed! I was fairly impressed with handling the GX7, and the only thing that disappointed me about the E-M1 was not the size but the weight, price notwithstanding. Therefore, I've -- hide signature --
